default.body_copy: This is the default skin of the Panel component

heading_text.body_copy: This panel uses normal copy in the title

heading_h4.body_copy: This panel uses a <h4> in the title

primary.body_copy: This panel uses the .panel-primary helper class.

success.body_copy: This panel uses the .panel-success helper class.

info.body_copy: This panel uses the .panel-info helper class.

warning.body_copy: This panel uses the .panel-warning helper class.
